thread.title_full: Freeze Pro Shop reviewed by JOE ANGUS

author: JOE ANGUS
title: JOE ANGUS
text: I recently Purchased a pair of Union Contact Pro bindings.They are,THE best.I shopped around,as im a savvy shopper and always want the best bang for my buck.Freeze pro certainly delivered on that score and and not buy a few quid either.I saved at least Â£40 and to top it off,delivery was super quick aswell,with text messages letting me know the progress of my purchase.Thanks alot to all the staff at Freeze Pro.Great job and great doing business.
